alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:53PM CDT until August 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHWESTERN ROLETTE COUNTIES... At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bottineau, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A trained spotter reported quarter size hail near Bottineau at 348 pm CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... International Peace Garden around 440 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pelican Point State Recreation Area, Carbury, Lake Metigoshe State Park, Homen State Forest and Butte St. Paul State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION with tornado like wind speeds expected. Mobile homes and high profile vehicles are especially susceptible to winds of this magnitude and may be overturned. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm has the potential to cause serious injury and significant property damage.
